# Since AI

> Since AI is Europe's AI builders community with 500+ members, based in Turku, Finland. We organize AI hackathons, publish developer guides, and connect AI builders across Europe.

## About

Since AI (Since AI ry, business ID 3593920-2) is a registered non-profit organization founded in 2025. We build the most active AI developer community in the Nordics through hackathons, meetups, and educational content.

- Website: https://sinceai.fi
- Location: Turku, Finland
- Members: 500+
- Hackathon Participants: 200+
- Projects Built: 30+
- Partners: 15+

## Key Events

- **Since AI Hackathon 2025**: Nov 21â€“23, 2025 at EduCity, Turku. 260 builders participated.
- **Since AI Hackathon 2026**: Planned for November 2026 in Turku. Dates TBA.

## Blog & Guides

Our blog covers AI hackathon strategies, tech stacks, project ideas, and European developer events:

- [AI Hackathon Project Ideas: 30 Buildable Concepts in 72 Hours](https://sinceai.fi/blog/ai-hackathon-project-ideas): 30 actionable AI project ideas categorized by difficulty with demo structures and stack suggestions.
- [Best AI Hackathons in Europe](https://sinceai.fi/blog/best-ai-hackathons-in-europe): Curated guide to Europe's top AI hackathons including Junction, Datathon ETH Zurich, GenAI Zurich, and more.
- [Hackathon Tech Stack Guide](https://sinceai.fi/blog/hackathon-tech-stack-guide): Battle-tested technology stack recommendations for shipping reliable hackathon demos.
- [How to Build a Demo in 72 Hours](https://sinceai.fi/blog/how-to-build-a-demo-in-72-hours): A demo-first approach to hackathon success with incremental AI feature development.
- [How to Win an AI Hackathon](https://sinceai.fi/blog/how-to-win-an-ai-hackathon): Demo-first playbook covering problem selection, reliable shipping, and effective pitching.
- [How to Form a Hackathon Team](https://sinceai.fi/blog/how-to-form-a-hackathon-team): Guide to building hackathon teams like startups with roles, decision-making, and execution rhythm.
